description: Alteration of diego (“Spaniard”), from Spanish Diego (common Spanish name) by law of Hobson-Jobson.

entries.meaning: (UK, slang, offensive, ethnic slur) A person of Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Greek, or other Mediterranean descent.
(US, Australia, slang, offensive, ethnic slur) A person of Italian descent.
examples: Synonyms: Eyetie, goombah, greaseball, guido, guinea, wog, wop
